Article Title: Nancy Kerrigan’s net worth: How the figure skating legend built success beyond the ice
Article Text:
Nancy Kerrigan’s net worth: How the figure skating legend built success beyond the ice (Image Via Getty Images)

Nancy Kerrigan's post‑competitive life and earnings

Nancy Kerrigan's early life and rise in skating

Nancy Kerrigan's famous 1994 attack and Olympic success

Nancy Kerrigan’s personal life

Nancy Kerrigan’s recent updates

Nancy Kerrigan is a well-known American figure skater admired for her skill and strength. She won two Olympic medals and was crowned the U.S. Figure Skating Champion in 1993. She became famous around the world not only for her skating, but also for her strong comeback after a shocking attack just weeks before the 1994 Olympics.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.After retiring from competitive skating, Nancy Kerrigan performed in ice shows such as Champions on Ice and Broadway on Ice. She also appeared on TV shows, including Dancing with the Stars. She wrote a skating book and took part in other skating events. Over the years, she earned money from endorsements with major brands and through her numerous public appearances. Because of her popularity and long career, her net worth is still estimated at around $10 million in 2025.Nancy Ann Kerrigan was born on October 13, 1969, in Stoneham, Massachusetts. She started skating when she was a young child. Her father worked hard and took many jobs so she could take skating lessons. Kerrigan loved the sport and got very good at it. She won small competitions when she was young and kept improving.Nancy worked her way up in American skating. She placed high in national championships and earned spots in world events. She won her first Olympic medal, a bronze at the 1992 Winter Olympics in Albertville, France. She also won a silver medal at the 1994 Lillehammer Olympics and a bronze at the 1994 World Championships.In January 1994, just weeks before the Winter Olympics, Nancy Kerrigan was hit on the knee by a man hired to injure her. This happened at the cobo arena ahead of the championships. The plan was to stop her from skating at the Olympics. The attack was widely shown on TV around the world.Nancy healed quickly and still went to the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway. There she skated very well and won the silver medal. This showed her strength and determination.Nancy Kerrigan married her agent and producer, Jerry Solomon, on September 9, 1995. It was her first marriage and his third. Together, they have three children: Matthew (born 1996), Brian (born 2005), and Nicole (born 2008). Jerry Solomon also has a son from a previous marriage.Nancy Kerrigan is still active in skating and public events in late 2025. She performed in the “Holiday Spectacular on Ice” at Gateway Playhouse in Bellport, New York, from November 28, 2025, to January 4, 2026, showing her skating skills and sharing inspiring moments from her career. She remains a respected skating icon, inspiring fans with her grace, resilience, and lasting legacy.Also Read: Adin Ross net worth in 2025: Kick earnings, cars, mansion, and investment portfolio
Article Summary: Nancy kerrigan is a well-known american figure skater admired for her skill and strength. She won two olympic medals and was crowned the u.s. Figure skating champion in 1993. She became famous around the world not only for her skating, but also for her strong comeback after a shocking attack just weeks before the 1994 olympics.

Article Title: 5 big-budget games that shockingly failed in 2025
Article Text:
Image via Activision, Obsidian Entertainment and Build a Rocket Boy

Big budget 2025 games that failed



1. MindsEye



MindsEye - Official Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

2. Black Ops 7



Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 | Gameplay Reveal Trailer

3. Monster Hunter Wilds (PC Version)



Monster Hunter Wilds - Launch Trailer

4. Avowed



Avowed - Official Launch Trailer

5. FBC: Firebreak



FBC: Firebreak - Official Launch Trailer Trailer

2025 has been a year of several wonderful games, and titles like Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and Ghost of Yotei were the main highlights. However, the year also featured some highly-anticipated games that were pretty abysmal. Such games are the perfect reminder that massive budgets cannot guarantee success.The best example would be MindsEye, which failed to resonate with audiences and was massively unsuccessful. Listed below are five big-budget titles from 2025 that ended up failing.Developed by Build a Rocket Boy and led by former Rockstar North president Leslie Benzies, MindsEye was marketed as a GTA killer. However, its launch was a technical disaster, and the game was plagued by bugs, janky AI, and poor mission design.With a devastating Metacritic score, the game was widely criticized for its lack of polish and personality. The failure was so severe that it was called one of the worst launches of the decade, resulting in widespread refunds on Steam and PlayStation.Call of Duty released back-to-back Black Ops titles in 2024 and 2025, and this decision backfired spectacularly with Black Ops 7. The game was torn by critics and fans for its reinvention of the campaign mode.They essentially made the story always-online and co-op focused, removing the classic cinematic pacing.Added to this, the inability to pause, even in solo play, and a lack of checkpoints turned the campaign into one of the worst in the franchise's history.While Monster Hunter Wilds was a content-rich success on consoles, its PC port became a symbol of technical failure. Even months after launch, the game remains poorly optimized, suffering from heavy stuttering and blurry visuals regardless of hardware.The reliance on aggressive upscaling, like DLSS, to even achieve playable frame rates led to extremely bad player feedback. Despite being a commercial hit initially, sales dropped off after the word of the technical issues spread.Obsidian’s Avowed suffered from an identity crisis throughout its long development. Originally teased as a dark, Skyrim-like open world, the final product was scaled down into a colorful, zone-based RPG that many felt lacked soul.Following multiple creative reboots and a director change, the game was quite disappointing. Even though it is technically playable, the shallow dialogues and repetitive combat failed to engage the audience.Remedy Entertainment usually releases some of the best games; however, they failed to do so with FBC: Firebreak. The game was basically sold as a multiplayer co-op successor to Control, but simply ended up being a generic shooter without any inventive content.FBC: Firebreak didn’t have the narrative magic of the Remedy Connected Universe, resulting in a lot of disappointment. With a very low active player count on Steam after release, it struggled to justify its existence alongside the more prestigious titles from Remedy.
Article Summary: Big budget 2025 games that failed to resonate with audiences. Mindseye was marketed as a gta killer. Monster hunter wilds (pc version) was a symbol of technical failure. Fbc: firebreak didn’t have the narrative magic of the remedy connected universe.

Article Title: Draymond Green goes candid on Steve Kerr altercation calling it a “huge moment of growth”
Article Text:
Draymond Green with Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr (Image via: Getty Images)

How Draymond Green's stepping away from conflict marked a defining moment?



Draymond Green’s candid reflection highlights maturity as the Golden State Warriors focusses on legacy

Draymond Green has never shied away from expressing his emotions or his feelings, and that spark has long been part of what defines him as a distinct player of the Golden State Warriors. However, one altercation with head coach Steve Kerr became more than just a matter of intense talk inside the NBA. Speaking candidly, Draymond Green described the incident as a moment of self-growth, showing a sight of self-reflection from a player who is often known for speaking his heart out.According to Draymond Green, this whole situation taught him a big lesson, making him understand when to step away rather than escalating and intensifying an already intense situation. He went on to explain that he did not in any way want one thing to become two, explaining how quickly words spoken in anger could create further damage to the reputation of a player. By removing himself and choosing to stay quiet, Green felt that he protected not only the integrity of the team but also his years-long relationship with Kerr.For a veteran player like Draymond Green, his decision to remove himself from the entire situation is quite impactful.Because the Warriors have built their team as well as their legacy based on trust and values carried forward by Kerr as their head coach. Thus, for Green, understanding what words to choose in a crucial situation such as this, and understanding when emotions cross their lines, is very important, especially given his influence over his younger teammates, watching him, and learning how to respond under pressure.The incident also highlighted one important learning that no matter how professional one is on-court, it doesn't define their off-court impact and the weight they carry as a part of their career. Green also acknowledged that some words, “you can’t come back from tomorrow”, reflected his maturity and his presence of mind that he has gained through his years of experience in the big league. Rather than getting frustrated and gaining unnecessary public attention, he chose to remain silent, reflecting upon the importance of emotional control and self-esteem, which one needs to maintain as an athlete.At this stage, what matters most for Green is his evolution as a player, as his career demands him. The Warriors are no longer just running after winning games, but they are trying to create a legacy of their own. And Green’s self-reflection on an intense situation like this is proof that in a league as big as the NBA, it is important to maintain personality and growth not just on the court but also off it.By openly talking about the altercation, Draymond Green also sent a very powerful message that, rather than playing blame games, it is important for a player to focus on their own game and choose their words wisely. In a league where there is trash talk going on, almost on a regular basis, his words showed a sign of responsibility and strength. For the Golden State Warriors, this incident could be taken as a moment to build trust between players and the coach, turning an intense situation into a meaningful one.Also Read: "It was actually amazing” – Warriors’ Draymond Green loved his 12-game suspension for heartfelt Christmas moment
Article Summary: Golden state warriors forward draymond green was involved in an altercation with head coach steve kerr. Green described the incident as a moment of self-growth. He said he did not in any way want one thing to become two. Green also acknowledged that some words, ‘you can’t come back from tomorrow’ reflected his maturity and his presence of mind.

Article Title: “I felt helpless”: Phillip Danault opens up about his trade from LA Kings to the Montreal Canadiens in a major NHL trade
Article Text:
Phillip Danault was traded to Montreal Canadiens from LA Kings in a major trade move (Image via Getty Images)

Philip Danault opens up for the first time about his trade to the Montreal Canadiens

Also read:

NHL Player Philip Danault has opened up for the first time after his trade from the Los Angeles Kings to the Montreal Canadiens in a major trade recently. The trade of Danault to the Montreal Canadians has raised serious concerns, as he played extremely well when he arrived in Los Angeles, but his overall play has tapered off.With the trade, the center will again play for the Montreal Canadiens, where he played from 2015-16 through 2020-21. This is a homecoming for Danault, who hails from Victoriaville, PQ, which is less than two hours from Montreal. Reports state that it has been almost a week since the Los Angeles Kings traded Phillip Danault to the Montreal Canadiens. While both sides have moved on, Danault made his season debut for the Canadiens on Tuesday. Let’s take a look at what Danault had to say about this trade to the Canadiens. Phillip Danault has spoken for the first time since the Los Angeles Kings traded him to the Montreal Canadiens. In his statement, it seemed that the former LA Kings center wasn't pleased with the way he was handled ahead of his return to Montreal. Ahead of Danault's return to Montreal, he spoke to the media for the first time since the trade was announced and discussed what led to his departure.Speaking to mediapersons in French, Danault stated, "I felt like I had no purpose and that I couldn't bring anything to the team with what I had. I felt helpless and not important. That's how I felt at the end."Previously, while speaking to the NHL, he stated, "I feel like chaos right now," Danault said. "I am moving my kids, my wife, we have a house there, selling the house, everything. So a big change, for Christmas especially. But I feel good. It was obviously tough towards the end in L.A., and did not feel well at all."Danault further expressed optimistically, "So a good start, a good, fresh start for me. I'm really happy to be here. Went from the oldest group to the youngest in the NHL. It's kind of a weird stat, but it's true, and I'm happy to be one of the mature guys here."Danault became the Canadiens' second-oldest player behind Brendan Gallagher after he was traded back to the team for whom he played from 2016-21. Earlier, Danault signed a six-year, $33 million contract ($5.5 million average annual value) with the Kings on July 28, 2021, and has one more year remaining after this season.According to the NHL, Danault had 194 points (54 goals, 140 assists) in 360 games when he played with the LA Kings. Apart from this, he had 195 points (70 goals, 125 assists) in his first four seasons in Los Angeles over 319 games. But this season has marked a downturn in his offensive production, with zero goals and five assists in 30 games.
Article Summary: Phillip danault was traded to montreal canadiens from la kings in a major trade move. Danault made his season debut for the canadiens on tuesday. The center will again play for the montreal canadiens, where he played from 2015-16 through 2020-21. This is a homecoming for danault, who hails from victoriaville, pq.

Article Title: Detroit Lions QB Jared Goff’s wife Christen reveals how motherhood inspired a complete makeover of both family homes
Article Text:
Jared Goff wife (Instagram and Getty Images)

Jared Goff ’s wife, Christen, creates two homes with one heart

Detroit Lions star Jared Goff’s wife, Christen, stepped into motherhood with the same intention she brings to every part of her life. Since welcoming daughter Romy, her days have been shaped by movement between two cities, two homes, and one new priority. While her husband leads the Detroit Lions on the field, Christen has been quietly redefining what home means during one of the biggest transitions of her life.Life now unfolds between Los Angeles and Michigan, places tied deeply to the couple’s journey. One carries the rhythm of the ocean, the other the warmth of Midwest winters. With a newborn in tow, those spaces needed to feel safe, calm, and deeply personal. Christen approached that challenge not as a checklist, but as an emotional reset that reflects who they are becoming as a family.For Christen Goff, adapting both houses meant, honoring their personalities while making room for Romy. She openly admits she is learning as she goes, sharing, “We’re so lucky to be able to live in two different places.” In California, where she grew up, the home leans into light and air. “I grew up in California, and there, we live by the beach, so our house kind of reflects that,” she says. “We live steps away from the ocean so our house definitely has more of a coastal feel, very indoor-outdoor, which we love.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Michigan tells a different story. “And then here in Michigan, our house is a little bit more cozy, kind of farmhouse country. We always have the fireplace going, even in the summer, which is kind of insane, but I would say that this house is so cozy and it just makes me want to cuddle up on the couch and watch a movie.” Each space now includes a nursery that mirrors its surroundings. “In L.A., it’s, like, boho, Bohemian,” she explains. “We have some fun antiques in there.” Michigan’s nursery leans softer. “And then this one is a little more classy,” she says. “Her nursery is so sweet here. It's very, like, muted pink tones. I went full into the girly pink.”As the holidays approach, Michigan will host Romy’s first Christmas. “We are here in Michigan through this season, so we're here, we'll be celebrating here, which is great,” Christen says, adding, “I love a California Christmas by the beach, but nothing beats a fireplace rolling with snow outside and your Christmas tree lit.”Behind the scenes, motherhood has brought exhaustion and joy in equal measure. “I feel like it's a roller coaster a bit,” she admits. Laundry piles up, routines shift, and patience gets tested. Still, perspective grounds her. “My key is chipping away day by day at everything,” she explains. “Just doing what you can and giving yourself grace.”In this season, Christen Goff has found belonging in a new circle. “I feel like I'm part of this new club of women and we all have something in common,” she says. “Moms are superheroes.” And now, Lions are out of playoff run and Goff's dream of winning Super Bowl ends here this year.Also Read: Travis Hunter’s wife Leanna turns heads in chic white bikini selfie during family birthday celebration
Article Summary: Detroit lions star jared goff’s wife, christen, stepped into motherhood with the same intention she brings to every part of her life. With a newborn in tow, those spaces needed to feel safe, calm, and deeply personal. Christen approached that challenge not as a checklist, but as an emotional reset.

Article Title: Samoa Joe and Jessica Seanoa combined net worth in 2025: Wrestling earnings, contracts, and financial legacy
Article Text:
Samoa Joe (Image Source: Getty)

Samoa Joe’s wrestling earnings, contracts, and overall net worth

All about Jessica Seanoa and their financial legacy

On a more personal note, the story of Nuufolau “Samoan Joe” Seanoa’s journey as a professional wrestler is exceptional. Yet Joe’s life with his wife, Jessica Seanoa, who also experienced the best and worst of Joe’s wrestling careers following the couple’s marriage back in 2007, reflects a world of its own. When considering the net worth of the married couple as of the year 2025, not only have the earnings from Joe’s wrestling contracts been considered, but the life that the couple has collectively experienced from the realities of the wrestling landscape also impacts the net worth as a whole.As of 2025, there are public estimates of Samoa Joe’s net worth, and they are estimated to be anywhere in the range of US$4 million to US$5 million, primarily generated from his extensive experience as a professional wrestler. Although in previous years, there were indications that his net worth would be higher in value, there are indications that his income is within the expected amount in the sport of professional wrestling, among those who are not among the best in the world. Joe has been earning money from his various contracts as a professional wrestler for TNA/Impact Wrestling, WWE, and currently for All Elite Wrestling (AEW), where he is still active as of 2025.Joe's professional income can thus be stated to be based on wrestling salaries, historically estimated to be around US$800,000 every year in WWE and possibly lower in his later contracts, and possibly supplemented by any acting engagements that come along due to his well-known name and quite eventful career. These acting roles might result in video game and TV-related roles that give Joe an occasional boost to his earnings.Jessica Seanoa has avoided the limelight of the wrestling world, living a private life with her husband. There is no known publicly available estimation of her net worth as an individual since she is not known within the public realm as a professional earner in her own right, but exists as a beneficiary of the life brought about through the wrestling career of her husband. Jessica married her husband in 2007.Taken together in 2025, their financial situation is centered on Joe’s wrestling career earnings and prudent decisions that come with age and a career that is physically demanding. Not one of the richest monikers in professional sports entertainment by any means, their experience is a reminder that a legacy is truly found in life after sports, and that finances in the sport look nothing like they do when one is under the bright lights that so many in other industries imagine.Also Read: Drew McIntyre and Kaitlyn Frohnapfel combined net worth in 2025: WWE success, fitness career, endorsement
Article Summary: Samoa joe’s wrestling earnings, contracts, and overall net worth are estimated to be anywhere in the range of us$4 million to us$5 million. Joe has been earning money from his various contracts as a professional wrestler for tna/impact wrestling, wwe, and currently for all elite wrestling.

Article Title: Connor Bedard's net worth in 2025: NHL salary, endorsements, records, achievements, and more
Article Text:
Connor Bedard (Image Via Twitter)

How Connor Bedard achieved career success, records, and recognition

Connor Bedard's Lifestyle IS NOT What You Think

The net worth of Connor Bedard, his NHL salary, endorsements, and career achievements have made him one of the most talked-about young stars in professional hockey. The center of the Chicago Blackhawks has been rather rapidly made known to the world with his amazing ability, early breakthroughs, and a series of world records. His combination of expensive contracts and endorsements has made Bedard’s financial and professional journey reflect his being a generational talent in hockey.According to Celebrity Net Worth, at the beginning of 2025, Connor Bedard’s net worth is estimated to be about $5 million, which comes mostly from his contract with the Chicago Blackhawks for three years worth $13.35 million, which is equal to $4.45 million per season on average. For the 2025–26 season, his base salary will be $855,000, and he will also get a signing bonus of $95,000. Besides this, he has endorsement contracts with CIBC, Gatorade Canada, Sher-Wood, Lululemon, and BioSteel that are bringing him very good income, along with being a part of charity activities like CIBC Miracle Day and community engagement programs.Bedard’s early career was nothing short of fantastic; he was the first player to be granted exceptional status in 2020, which allowed him to join the WHL at age 15, and was the number one pick in the WHL Bantam Draft by the Regina Pats.Afterward, he kept on dominating in the WHL, netting 51 goals in the 2021–22 season and being the league’s top scorer in 2022–23. He received several awards, such as the Jim Piggott Memorial Trophy, Bob Clark Trophy, Four Broncos Memorial Trophy, and CHL Player of the Year.On an international level, Bedard was Canada’s representative at the U18 and World Junior Championships, where he got several gold medals and smashed scoring records for under-19 players. The IIHF World Junior Player of the Year Award was presented to him, and he was also part of the Media All-Star teams for 2021 and 2023, confirming his standing as one of the best forwards in the world.In the professional ranks, he was first selected in the 2023 NHL Draft and signed a contract with the Chicago Blackhawks, where he founded a new era. He set a record as the youngest player to score two goals in one game for the Blackhawks, and he had the biggest number of fans watching his NHL debut. Besides the performance bonuses, his salary and endorsements are constantly increasing, which makes him one of the brightest stars in hockey’s youth market.A young athlete with a bright future ahead of him is portrayed by Connor Bedard through his net worth, salary, endorsements, and career milestones. With his remarkable talent, steady breaking of records, and attractive character, he is sure to have a successful career on and off the ice.Also Read: Cale Makar net worth 2025: NHL achievements, Career, contracts, prize money, endorsements and more
Article Summary: The net worth of connor bedard, his nhl salary, endorsements, and career achievements have made him one of the most talked-about young stars in professional hockey. The center of the chicago blackhawks has been rather rapidly made known to the world with his amazing ability, early breakthroughs, and a series of world records.

Article Title: Sophie Cunningham’s net worth in 2025: WNBA star’s career earnings, endorsements, achievements and more
Article Text:
Image via Getty

What is Sophie Cunningham’s net worth?

What are some of the major endorsements landed by Sophie Cunningham?

What was Sophie Cunningham’s early life like?

What are Sophie Cunningham’s achievements?

Also Read

Sophie Cunningham is one of the most searched players in 2025. The WNBA star has left a mark both on the court and with her off-court appearances. She has been widely known as the “enforcer” since she moved to the Indiana Fever team. The athlete started her career within the league in 2019. Recently, Sophie even edged out Caitlin Clark to become one of the most searched athletes on Google.Owing to her tenure within the league and partnerships with different brands, the athlete has earned quite a fortune for herself. Apart from all these, the athlete has also signed podcast deals. She also works as a sports analyst for the Phoenix Suns broadcasts. With all of these considered, let’s take a look at the athlete’s net worth, career earnings, endorsements and everything that you need to know about her. The athlete has garnered fame within just a few years into the league.According to Celebrity Net Worth, Sophie Cunningham’s net worth stands at $2 million. The earnings came from her games, brand endorsements and other jobs that the athlete takes up during the off-season.She is the 13th overall pick in the 2019 WNBA Draft and was chosen by the Phoenix Mercury. Later in 2024, the athlete moved to the Indiana Fever. There, she signed a one-year, $100,000 contract. She previously signed a $304,500 extension in 2023-2024. Towards the end of the 2025 season, her total earnings from within the league have been estimated to be around $637,780. There has been a constant increase in her salary and it can be expected that her earnings will further increase in the coming years.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Sophie has landed major endorsements with brands throughout her career. Some of these brands are Adidas, Arby’s, Ring (a home security solutions provider), and recently the Sun-Cruiser. She has also signed a podcast deal with The Volume and co-hosts “Show Me Something with West Wilson of Bravo’s Summer House.” The Sun-Cruiser deal was announced by the athlete during the off-season period this year.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Sophie Cunningham was born on August 16, 1996, in Columbia, Missouri. Her parents, Paula and Jim Cunningham, were both athletes at the University of Missouri. It is quite interesting that Sophie’s first sport wasn’t basketball. She was interested in martial arts and at the age of 6, the athlete earned her black belt in taekwondo. During her high school life at Rock Bridge High School, she played both basketball and volleyball. Sophie followed her parents’ footsteps and attended the University of Missouri. She played for the Tigers for four straight seasons.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Throughout her career since high school, college and the WNBA, Sophie Cunningham has achieved significant achievements. She was named a McDonald’s All-American in 2015. In the following year, she was also named SEC Freshman of the Year. Sophie was selected for the SEC All-Freshman Team in 2016 and First-team All-SEC in 2017, 2018, and 2019. She even led the Indiana Fever to become the WNBA Commissioner's Cup Champion in 2025.
Article Summary: Sophie cunningham was born on august 16, 1996, in columbia, missouri. Her parents, paula and jim cunningham, were both athletes at the university of missouri. She was named a mcdonald’s all-american in 2015. Sophie was selected for the sec all-freshman team in 2016 and first-team all-sec in 2017, 2018, and 2019.

Article Title: Top 5 hardest homeruns to ever hit in MLB: Oneil Cruz, Giancarlo Stanton, Ronald Acuña Jr. and more
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Oneil Cruz: 122.9 mph against Milwaukee Brewers

Giancarlo Stanton: 121.7 mph against Texas Rangers

Giancarlo Stanton belts 449-ft. home run at 121.7 mph

Giancarlo Stanton: 121.3 mph against Washington Nationals

Ronald Acuña Jr.: 121.2 mph against Los Angeles Dodgers

Aaron Judge: 121.1 mph against Baltimore Orioles

Baseball has always been a sport filled with amazing moments, and few plays showcase that better than a home run. Ever since Statcast started tracking exit velocities in 2015, fans and analysts have had a fresh perspective to gauge the incredible force behind every swing. Although distance and trajectory often take center stage, exit velocity reveals the real tale of raw power, it shows how quickly the ball departs from the bat.In the last ten years, a few power hitters have changed the game by hitting baseballs with such force that it feels like they’re breaking the laws of physics, leaving fans in awe. Big names like Giancarlo Stanton and Aaron Judge are at the top of these stats, but players like Oneil Cruz and Ronald Acuña Jr. have also made their mark with swings that fans will never forget.Oneil‍‌‍‍‌‍‌‍‍‌ Cruz was the one who created a great moment in baseball history when he launched a solo homerun to the Milwaukee Brewers at PNC Park in Pittsburgh on May 25, 2025. The blast was so powerful that it was measured at a stunning 122.9 mph off the bat, thus recording the highest exit velocity of a home run in the Statcast era. As a matter of fact, it is also the hardest-hit batted ball and base hit which has been recorded since the tracking began in ‍‌‍‍‌‍‌‍‍‌2015.The scene was a midseason game for the Pirates, who were in the hunt for a wild-card spot in the National League. Cruz, famous for his impressive exit velocities over the years, had just hit a 117.9 mph homer two days earlier on May 23, and he made contact with a fastball from Brewers pitcher Freddy Peralta.The ball zipped over the left-field wall quickly, flying about 432 feet even with the high speed, which usually leads to shorter but straight-line paths. This hit broke past old records and showcased Cruz's special mix of strength and bat speed, honed during his days in the Pirates' minor leagues, where he was recorded throwing 105.3 mph from the outfield.On August 9, 2018, Giancarlo Stanton hit a massive 121.7 mph shot, landing him in second place during a home game against the Texas Rangers at Yankee Stadium. This two-run homer in the third inning off Doug Fister marked Stanton's third straight game with a home run, highlighting his position as the main power hitter for the New York Yankees that summer.The Yankees were deep in the AL East pennant chase, trailing only a few games behind their rivals, the Boston Red Sox. With Aaron Judge out due to a wrist chip fracture he got in late July, Stanton took on the offensive responsibility, hitting the ball with power.On a warm Bronx evening, the ball soared into the second deck of the left-field seats, traveling a distance that highlighted Stanton's incredible strength, which he developed during his time with the Marlins when he snagged the 2017 NL MVP award.Stanton makes another appearance at No. 3 with a massive 121.3 mph hit on July 25, 2020, against the Washington Nationals at Nationals Park. This solo home run happened during the Yankees' second game of the shortened 60-game season due to the pandemic, off a pitch from Nationals starter Erick Fedde in the fourth inning.New York was getting used to a hub-based schedule in Washington, D.C., while following COVID-19 protocols, as the team looked to bounce back from their 2019 ALCS exit. Stanton's home run almost equaled his personal best for hardest-hit homer at that moment, flying an estimated 483 feet, his longest since he joined the Yankees in December 2018 and the second-longest of his career. The projected trajectory brought back memories of his time in Miami, where he often hit bombs over 450 feet.On September 2, 2023, Ronald Acuña Jr. capped off the top four with a blazing 121.2 mph shot during a road game against the Los Angeles Dodgers at Dodger Stadium. The Atlanta Braves outfielder crushed a fastball from Dodgers rookie Emmet Sheehan, sending it 454 feet to dead center in the sixth inning, a solo homer that contributed to a 6-1 win.The Braves were on track for their sixth consecutive NL East title, with Acuña just having made history on August 31 as the first player in MLB to hit 30 homers and steal 60 bases in a season—what's known as the "30-60 club." Just two days later, he hit another homer during a crucial interleague series against the NL West-leading Dodgers, highlighting Atlanta's offensive strength driven by Acuña, Matt Olson, and Austin Riley.Aaron Judge makes the top five with a massive 121.1 mph homer on June 10, 2017, against the Baltimore Orioles at Yankee Stadium. This three-run shot in the first inning off Orioles pitcher Chris Tillman capped off a rally that saw 10 Yankees come to the plate, resulting in an 8-1 blowout.The Yankees were on fire in the AL East, riding a wave of young talent during Judge's breakout rookie year, where he smashed 52 home runs and snagged the AL Rookie of the Year award. This home run came during what MLB.com called an 'offensive deluge,' as New York scored six runs in that inning to turn around an early deficit.Also Read: Chicago White Sox GM Chris Getz reveals how the team plans to address Munetaka Murakami’s high strikeout rate
Article Summary: Giancarlo stanton hit a 449-ft. home run at 121.7 mph on august 9, 2018. Oneil cruz hit a 122.9 mph homerun against the milwaukee brewers on may 25, 2025. Ronald acuña jr. hit a 121.3 mph home run against the washington nationals on july 25, 2020. Ronald acuña jr. hit a 121.2 mph homer against the los angeles dodgers on september 2, 2023.

Article Title: Jordan Spieth’s net worth in 2025: How the three-time golf champion built his fortune
Article Text:
Jordan Spieth’s net worth in 2025: How a three-time golf champion built his fortune (Image Via Getty Images)



Jordan Spieth’s career earnings and major wins

Jordan Spieth’s early life and rise in golf

Jordan Spieth’s endorsements, recent updates, and life today

Jordan Spieth is a famous American golfer known for his calm style and big wins at a young age. He plays on the PGA Tour and was once ranked world number one. Spieth has won three major championships and the FedEx Cup, making him one of the most successful and highest-earning golfers of his generation.According to Celebrity Net Worth, Jordan Spieth’s net worth is estimated at $120 million. He earns money from tournament wins, brand deals, and long-term sponsorships. Over the years, Spieth has built a strong career on the PGA Tour and remains one of golf’s highest-paid players.Jordan Spieth has made more than $55 million just from PGA Tour prize money, based on official PGA records. He has also won three major titles in his career. These include the Masters and the U.S. Open in 2015, and the Open Championship in 2017.The year 2015 was the biggest of his career. He won five PGA Tour events, lifted the FedEx Cup, earned over $12 million in winnings, and collected a $10 million FedEx Cup bonus.Jordan Spieth was born in Dallas, Texas, on July 27, 1993. He started playing golf very soon. Nevertheless, even in his early days, it was evident he possessed a very special gift.He devoted many hours to practicing and became a champion in junior tournaments all over the United States. During his teenage years, he was ranked as one of the best junior golfers in the U.S.Spieth got enrolled in the University of Texas, where he won the NCAA golf title when he was a first-year student. He signed his first professional contract in 2012. Just after one year, he took the last golf classic, becoming the first teen to win over a PGA Tour event in more than 80 years.Jordan Spieth makes a large part of his income from endorsements. His long-time partners include Under Armour, AT&T, Rolex, and Titleist.In recent years, Spieth has remained active on the PGA Tour. In 2022, he won the RBC Heritage, his 13th PGA Tour title. In 2023, he played a key role in Team USA’s Ryder Cup victory in Rome. As of early 2025, he continues to compete regularly, with no major injuries reported.Off the course, Spieth lives in Dallas with his wife, Annie Verret, and their son. In addition, he has the Jordan Spieth Family Foundation which is dedicated to providing assistance to children with special needs, supporting pediatric cancer care, military families, and even promoting junior golf.Also Read: Frank Warren names perfect time in place for Tyson Fury vs Anthony Joshua showdown
Article Summary: Jordan spieth is a famous american golfer known for his calm style and big wins. He plays on the pga tour and was once ranked world number one. Spieth has won three major championships and the fedex cup. He earns money from tournament wins, brand deals, and long-term sponsorships.

Article Title: Cooper Flagg gets heartfelt praise from Warriors legend Stephen Curry after Mavericks’ Christmas Game loss
Article Text:
Stephen Curry and Cooper Flagg. Image via: Eric Gay | Julio Cortez/ AP

Stephen Curry praises Cooper Flagg after Mavericks loss



Cooper Flagg performance shines on Christmas stage



Cooper Flagg’s first Christmas Day appearance puts him under immense pressure. The Dallas Mavericks rookie did not lose his cool despite the team being hit with a major Anthony Davis injury setback. Flagg delivered his most complete performance on one of the league’s biggest stages against the veteran Golden State Warriors team.The Mavericks fell 126-116 in San Francisco, but Flagg’s impact stood out well beyond the final score. His composure, shot selection, and control in traffic drew attention throughout the game. After the final buzzer, Stephen Curry offered some kind words for Flagg.Stephen Curry, who led the Warriors with 23 points and sealed the game late with a deep three-pointer, took time after the game to recognize Cooper Flagg’s presence and mindset."Just a true hooper. Competitor. He forgets how young he is. The future is bright, I'm glad that he got this experience his first year. The league is in good hands," Curry said after the game.Curry hit nine free throws and navigated defensive pressure, while Flagg matched him possession for possession during key moments. Golden State leaned on balanced scoring, including 14 points from Al Horford and 16 from DeAnthony Melton, to secure its third straight win.Flagg finished with a game-high 27 points on 13-for-21 shooting, adding six rebounds and a team-leading five assists in his Christmas Day debut. He scored at all three levels, attacked closeouts, and created opportunities when Golden State’s defense tightened. His lone three-pointer came within the flow of the offense, and his decision-making kept Dallas within reach during key stretches.The Mavericks faced challenges early after Anthony Davis exited in the second quarter with right groin spasms. With Dallas losing a primary option, Flagg assumed added responsibility. During a prolonged second-half run where the Warriors struggled from deep, Dallas trimmed the deficit to six points with 4:28 remaining. Flagg’s poise fueled that push, even as Golden State ultimately regained control behind timely plays from Curry and Gary Payton II.Dallas made only four three-pointers as a team and was outscored heavily from beyond the arc. Even so, Flagg’s efficiency and command helped stabilize the offense. P.J. Washington recorded 14 points and 10 rebounds, while Brandon Williams added 26 off the bench.Also Read: Karl-Anthony Towns makes Jordyn Woods’ Christmas unforgettable with a skyline proposal
Article Summary: Stephen curry praises cooper flagg after mavericks loss to golden state warriors. Flagg scored 27 points on 13-for-21 shooting, adding six rebounds and a team-leading five assists. Curry: "just a true hooper. Competitor. He forgets how young he is. The future is bright"

Article Title: What is Savannah James’ net worth in 2025? Exploring Lakers’ legend LeBron James’ wife’s financial earnings, investments, and more
Article Text:
LeBron James and Savannah James (Image via: Getty Images)

What is Savannah James’ net worth in 2025?

Savannah James`s Lifestyle 2025 Husband LeBron, Kids, Career, Age, House Tour And Net Worth

A look into Savannah James’ investments, philanthropy, and more



In addition to being the wife of one of the legends in the history of the NBA, Savannah James has also significantly built an identity of her own that goes far beyond being just the wife of a basketball legend. In 2025, the Los Angeles Lakers’ legend, LeBron James’ wife, Savannah James, stands out as a successful entrepreneur, philanthropist, and businesswoman known for her clear purpose and consistency.Given her status, it’s difficult to maintain a very private life. However, over the years, Savannah James has tried to keep her life away from the public eye, however, her influence across various businesses continues to grow. She has a plethora of income sources, having been involved in fashion initiatives, wellness, and community work.As of 2025, Savannah James is said to have a net worth of around $100 million, per Celebrity Net Worth, on the basis of her business initiatives and long-term financial investments. Her financial earnings and independent assets, which are independent of LeBron James’, make her one of the most financially successful and affluent women in the sports world.One of Savannah James’ initiatives is “The Home Court”, a women-focused wellness program that is based in Los Angeles. It was designed to support and empower creative and professional women who are driven by passion. Along with that, she previously owned a juicery the “Juice Spot”, back in Miami. She is also the co-host of a famous podcast called “Everybody’s Crazy” and runs a YouTube channel with her daughter, Zhuri James.Philanthropy also plays a major role in Savannah James’ professional journey. Through the “LeBron James Family Foundation”, Savannah James supports education for underprivileged children in Akron, Ohio, provides scholarships, and also supports women’s welfare programs as well as community development. While philanthropy is not quite profit-oriented, however, it surely enhances her leadership profile and influence.Other than that, Savannah James also runs a mentorship program, “Women of Our Future”, that empowers young women in Akron, Ohio, her hometown, to help them become strong and successful individuals. She is also the founder of the “IPROMise Makeover, an event she founded to provide young school-going girls in Akron with free prom dresses and makeovers, to ensure that they have a wonderful prom night experience.Also Read: “It’s amazing to watch”: LeBron James reacts emotionally as Savannah James steps into her own spotlight away from NBA stage
Article Summary: Savannah james is said to have a net worth of around $100 million, per celebrity net worth. Her financial earnings and independent assets, which are independent of lebron james’, make her one of the most financially successful and affluent women in the sports world. She has been involved in fashion initiatives, wellness, and community work.

Article Title: Record! 14-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi scripts history, becomes the first cricketer ever to ...
Article Text:
Vaibhav Sooryavanshi (PTI Photo)

A Father's Pride: How RR, Dravid & Vikram Shaped Vaibhav Suryavanshi

NEW DELHI: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi created history with a stunning performance in the Vijay Hazare Trophy on Wednesday. Playing for Bihar in their first Plate Group match of the 2025–26 season, the 14-year-old opener produced one of the most remarkable innings ever seen in domestic cricket Sooryavanshi smashed 190 runs from just 84 balls against Arunachal Pradesh. He opened the batting for the Sakibul Gani-led Bihar side and completely dominated the bowlers from the start.During his explosive knock, he hit 16 fours and 15 sixes, showing confidence and power well beyond his age.With this innings, Sooryavanshi achieved a unique world record. He became the first men’s cricketer in history to score centuries in both List A and T20 cricket before turning 15. The youngster from Samastipur has already made headlines earlier by becoming the youngest player to score a century in the IPL and T20 cricket.On Wednesday, he added another milestone to his growing list of achievements.At 14 years and 272 days, Sooryavanshi became the youngest batter to score a century in men’s List A cricket.He broke a long-standing record held by Pakistan’s Zahoor Elahi, who was 15 years and 209 days old when he scored an unbeaten 103 in 1986.Sooryavanshi reached his century in just 36 balls against Arunachal Pradesh.At that moment, it was the second-fastest List A hundred by an Indian batter. However, by the end of the day, his effort slipped to fourth place after Sakibul Gani and Ishan Kishan scored even faster centuries in 32 and 33 balls respectively.The young batter was not done even after reaching his hundred. He raced to 150 runs in just 59 balls, breaking another major record. This effort helped him surpass AB de Villiers’ record for the fastest 150 in List A cricket. De Villiers had taken 64 balls to reach the mark during the 2015 ODI World Cup match between South Africa and West Indies.Sooryavanshi’s knock played a huge role in Bihar posting a massive total, which later became a world record score of 574 in List A cricket. His fearless approach and record-breaking innings have once again underlined why he is seen as one of the brightest young talents in Indian cricket.
Article Summary: Vaibhav sooryavanshi scored 190 runs from just 84 balls against arunachal pradesh. He became the first men’s cricketer in history to score centuries in both list a and t20 cricket before turning 15. The youngster from samastipur has already made headlines earlier by becoming the youngest player to score a century in the ipl and t 20 cricket.

Article Title: '​​It's not an ideal contest': Vaibhav Sooryavanshi's stunning Vijay Hazare knock raises questions in R Ashwin's mind
Article Text:
R Ashwin and Vaibhav Sooryavanshi

India T20 World Cup squad: In search of ideal combination, Agarkar & Co. drop Shubman Gill

NEW DELHI: Former India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin has raised concerns about the quality gap between teams in Indian domestic cricket after a one-sided match in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.His comments came after Bihar scored a massive 574 runs (their highest team total in men’s List A cricket) in 50 overs against Arunachal Pradesh.Ashwin said that while big scores are impressive, such matches do not offer real competition.Speaking on his YouTube channel, Ashwin praised young batter Vaibhav Sooryavanshi for his performance but questioned the bigger picture.“Huge applause for Vaibhav Sooryavanshi. But I again want to ask a question. There is a huge divide, chalk and cheese, in terms of quality with some teams. It becomes very lop-sided with some teams and there is no contest at all," Ashwin said."It is not an ideal contest. Credit to Vaibhav for his performance. He is doing what he has to do. But if we are serious about teams like Arunachal Pradesh becoming good sides, what will this do to their confidence?"In the match, Bihar completely dominated Arunachal Pradesh.Along with Sooryavanshi (190 off 84 balls), Ayush Loharuka (116 off 56 balls) and captain Sakibul Gani (128 off 40 balls) also scored centuries.Ashwin also spoke about Ishan Kishan and praised his comeback journey. He said Kishan’s recent success shows the importance of hard work and patience.“Everyone goes through good and bad times but Ishan Kishan had a challenging time. He came and then was out from the team, he took a break. He made a double hundred in one-day but never made a comeback. He scored a hundred in the IPL but then did not have a great IPL," Ashwin added."He played well in the SMAT and in the run of events got into the T20 World Cup squad. Now he is batting in the middle-order slot in the VHT and scored a 33-ball hundred. It shows what confidence and form can do to a person when time aligns. He has not waited saying his time will come, he has put in that effort."
Article Summary: Former india spinner ravichandran ashwin has raised concerns about the quality gap between teams in indian domestic cricket. His comments came after bihar scored a massive 574 runs in 50 overs against arunachal pradesh. Ashwin praised young batter vaibhav sooryavanshi for his performance but questioned the bigger picture.

Article Title: NBA updates: Ben Simmons’ return on hold, Sebastian Telfair returns home for Christmas and more
Article Text:
Images via Getty

When is Ben Simmons returning to the NBA?

Sebastian Telfair returns home for Christmas after serving prison sentence

Cam Whitmore misses another Washington Wizards game

Also Read:

Ben Simmons’ return to the NBA has been put on hold for a surprising reason. The 29-year-old athlete started his career within the league in 2016. Since then, for the first time, the player is without a team. He was drafted by the Philadelphia 76ers. Right now, Ben feels that he will only be back in the court once he is sure that he can rely on his body.While Ben’s decision has left fans wondering about his return, Sebastian Telfair made his way back home after completing his prison sentence. The athlete has returned home for Christmas . After being released from prison, Sebastian is making the news for all the right reasons. While these are the off-court highlights, on the court, Cam Whitmore missed another Washington Wizards game. The athlete will reportedly be out indefinitely due to his injury.Ben Simmons is currently without a team and is a free agent. However, the player seems to be in no mood to return anytime soon. The athlete has stated that he would only return once he feels that his body can take the amount of stress required for the game. He is currently the main operator and majority owner of the South Florida Sails Angling Club in the Sport Fishing Championship (SFC).It is a pro-offshore saltwater fishing league started in 2021.It seems like the athlete is currently more invested in his passion for fishing. This has left fans wondering about the potential return timeline for Ben. The young athlete, throughout his career in the NBA, has earned around $270 million. This means that he can comfortably make the decision instead of rushing it. Meanwhile, Ben has reestablished connections with Rich Paul and Klutch Sports. This means that a potential return for the athlete is definitely on the table.Sebastian Telfair was one of the most promising young athletes when he first joined the league. However, the 2021 debacle revolving around the league’s health and welfare benefit scheme made his career fall apart. According to reports, it started in 2017 and included fake medical and dental bills.The athlete admitted to the accusations in 2023. A community service was mandated by the court along with his regular reports to the US Probation Office. However, the player failed to do so and was sentenced to 6 months in prison. Sebastian issued an apology and asked for forgiveness. Now he has been released. And is back home for Christmas.Cam Whitmore has been out due to an injury. The athlete is suffering from deep vein thrombosis in his right shoulder and will be out indefinitely. A detailed diagnosis revealed a blood clot on his shoulder. Further examinations revealed that Whitmore had DVT. Owing to his health condition, the athlete missed another Washington Wizards game against the Charlotte Hornets.
Article Summary: Sebastian telfair returns home for christmas after serving prison sentence. Cam whitmore misses another washington wizards game. Ben simmons’ return to the nba has been put on hold for a surprising reason. The 29-year-old athlete started his career within the league in 2016.

Article Title: Dak Prescott’s Christmas gesture on Hard Knocks unveils a refreshing insight into the Cowboys amidst a disappointing season
Article Text:
Dak Prescott (via Getty Images)

A brief Hard Knocks moment that revealed how Dak Prescott leads when things are hard

The Dallas Cowboys did not expect a somber atmosphere as December is about to come to a close. Between a Christmas Day game streaming on Netflix and HBO’s in-season Hard Knocks focusing on the NFC East, Dallas has become one of the league’s most visible teams. The season opened with championship-level expectations but delivered shocking losses, uneven execution, and growing tension in the team dynamics.Amidst the frustrations, QB Dak Prescott recently had an inspiring and generous statement to share with his teammates. The QB put the focus on the support staff that has supported them time and time again, despite the results, and urged the team to make donations to them for the holidays.This show of inspiring leadership and big-heartedness from Prescott was seen in a short teaser from this week’s Hard Knocks episode. The QB stood in front of his teammates with a message that had nothing to do with the team’s stats. He encouraged players to donate money toward bonuses for the Cowboys’ support staff.Prescott pushed the group to give generously and reminded them “not to hold back during the holidays.” The clip struck a nerve with fans because it showed awareness at a time when frustration could easily turn inward.NFL support staff often work grueling hours with little public recognition, and their compensation does not always match the demands of the job.The NFL Players Association has raised this issue repeatedly, and Prescott’s message felt like action following those words. The Hard Knocks doc has shown the emotional weight of a season for the Cowboys that has not gone the way they hoped. In that environment, Prescott’s gesture reflected an understanding captain who is aware of the environment around himIt also offered fans a different lens through which to view the team. Moments like this showcase why Prescott continues to command respect and is admired by his teammates. His ability to recognize people who are vital for the team’s stability and take care of them whenever he can shows his incredible quality as a leader and is a moment of levity amidst the disappointments.Also read: “This is our job”: Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott refuses to cheat the game after being eliminated from the 2025 NFL Playoffs
Article Summary: Dak prescott urged his teammates to donate money toward bonuses for the cowboys' support staff. The nfl players association has raised this issue repeatedly, and prescott’s message felt like action following those words. The clip struck a nerve with fans because it showed awareness at a time when frustration could easily turn inward.

Article Title: David Montgomery injury update: Is Lions RB playing today vs. Vikings?
Article Text:
Image via USA TODAY NETWORK

What injury is David Montgomery dealing with?

Should fantasy managers expect David Montgomery to play?

Also Read:

The Detroit Lions face a crucial Christmas Day test against the Minnesota Vikings in Week 17, and one name Lions fans have been closely tracking is running back David Montgomery. With playoff hopes still mathematically alive, Detroit will want as many key contributors available as possible - and Montgomery’s status has been a late-week talking point.Montgomery was added to the injury report earlier this week due to an illness rather than a physical injury. While illnesses can sometimes linger or worsen late in the week, the Lions have not indicated that Montgomery is dealing with anything severe. Importantly, he avoided the injured reserve list and has remained around the team throughout the week.The illness surfaced after Montgomery practiced in full earlier in the week. He then missed a session before returning in a limited capacity, which ultimately led to the Lions listing him as questionable for the Week 17 matchup.Despite the questionable tag, Montgomery’s practice participation points toward optimism. After sitting out earlier in the week, he was able to log a limited practice on Wednesday. That return to the field is often viewed as a positive sign, especially when the issue is illness rather than something structural like a hamstring or ankle injury.NFL teams are typically cautious when it comes to illnesses, but it’s relatively uncommon for a player of Montgomery’s importance to miss a must-win game solely because of sickness, particularly when there are signs of improvement.Final confirmation will come when the Lions and Vikings release their inactive lists roughly 90 minutes before kickoff.Based on the available information, Montgomery appears more likely to play than sit. His limited practice late in the week and the nature of the injury both point in that direction. However, even if active, expectations should be tempered.Montgomery’s workload has dipped in recent weeks, and he has not seen consistent double-digit carries since midseason. That trend is unlikely to change dramatically, especially with Gibbs continuing to dominate snaps.As of now, it looks like Montgomery will be ready to play for the Lions in Week 17 against the Vikings. Nothing is definite until the inactives are revealed, but all indicators point to Detroit expecting him to play. It's still unclear if that will have a big effect on the field, but just having him there would help the Lions try to keep their season going.
Article Summary: The detroit lions face the minnesota vikings on christmas day. Running back david montgomery was added to the injury report earlier this week due to an illness rather than a physical injury. He missed a session before returning in a limited capacity, which ultimately led to the lions listing him as questionable for the game.

Article Title: “One of the greatest of our time” NBA star’s heartfelt reunion with MSU shooting survivor leaves fans in awe
Article Text:
James Harden with MSU shooting victim John Hao (Image via: Getty Images)

James Harden shows friendship beyond basketball in emotional reunion with John Hao

Fans react as James Harden’s lifelong friendship with John Hao continues to inspire

In a very heart-warming moment, NBA star James Harden has reunited with the Michigan State University student, John Hao, who was paralyzed in the tragic MSU campus shooting back in 2023. Harden first reached out to Hao, following the shooting incident, after learning he was a huge fan of the star. And over the years, their connection has turned into a lifelong and meaningful friendship.John Hao is a 20-year-old international student from China, who was left paralyzed after being shot in the back on February 13, 2023, campus attack that killed three students and injured five others. When Harden heard about his tragic story and discovered Hao’s admiration for him, he immediately went over to meet him, FaceTimed him, and also encouraged him, donated money to him, along with sending gifts, including his sneakers.James Harden first bonded with John Hao in 2023, when Harden invited Hao to an NBA playoff game in Philadelphia, once he was able to travel again. At game 4 of the Eastern Conference semifinals, Harden handed over his own signed sneakers to Hao, a core memory for Hao, which is worth remembering. Hao was courtside in his wheelchair, and they shared a very special moment together on the court. Harden scored 42 points in that game, making the whole experience an unforgettable one for Hao.And James Harden has once again reunited with his old friend, John Hao, recently, as per a post by Bleacher Report shared on their Instagram page, on December 24, 2025. The Instagram post shared images and moments from their recent reunion, reflecting how Harden’s constant encouragement and motivation have meant so much to Hao, as he has been dealing with a lifetime of trauma.The recent Bleacher Report post highlights how, over the years, James Harden and John Hao have maintained their friendship and remained close, despite Harden’s trade from Philadelphia to the Los Angeles Clippers. It shows that what started as just support for a fan has eventually turned into a lifelong friendship for years to come.According to the post shared on Instagram, it was more than just photos, it was a celebration of love and years-long friendship. Fans and followers have responded to the news with warm wishes and appreciation for Hadren. One fan commented, “Yeah I’m definitely a James Harden fan now”. “W Harden”, a second fan commented. “Respect to Harden. That’s awesome”, a third fan wrote. While another one commented, “Harden is a real one”. While another one wrote, “James Harden really one of the greatest of our time”. “Respect Harden for keeping the promise, seems like a great guy”, one fan added. These reactions highlight how athletes can use their influence positively to have a lasting impact off the court and win their fans over.Also Read: “ Y'all 2 different" - James Harden fires playful shot at LeBron James and Kevin Durant as he storms into NBA’s top 10 All-Time scorers
Article Summary: Nba star james harden has reunited with the michigan state university student, john hao, who was paralyzed in the tragic msu campus shooting back in 2023. Harden first reached out to hao after learning he was a huge fan of the star. And over the years, their connection has turned into a lifelong and meaningful friendship.
